channel.title: Magic delay
channel.description: how i cahnge my magic delay in pking ? like i need w8 5 seconds for cast the same spell !! how i change it ?

item.title: Magic delay
item.dc:creator: @jonta_knight jonta knight
item.description:
@jonta_knight wrote:

PkingDelay = 6; add that under

hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25);
startAnimation(1979);
castOnPlayer.uberentangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();

Read full topic

item.title: Magic delay
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

add an actionTimer

somewhere in the correct place:

actionTimer = 5;

timer - ms

-hope i helped

item.title: Magic delay
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

look my spell donâ€™t have pking delay

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] > 93) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 40 "+getItemName(560)+", 40 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 60 "+getItemName(554)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 4); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }
